mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( title, content, writer ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.select: SELECT board_no, title, content, writer, reg_date FROM board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
SELECT board_no, title, content, writer, reg_date FROM board WHERE board_no > 0 ORDER BY board_no DESC, reg_date DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{sizePerPage}
SELECT count(board_no) FROM board WHERE board_no > 0
